attributes.action: withdraw from the 2012 London Olymics project
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Clearly the bid was won under flawed assumptions and any business case which existed when the cost was under £3bn must surely now be extinct: given costs have already almost quadrupled to over £9bn and there is still another 5 years of opportunity for more cost increases, given the inability to meet / beat either budget or delivery on projects considered modest by comparison (Wembley, Dome, Scottish Parliament), then it is time to cancel the project now to allow the Olympic Committee to recover the siutation.

rejection.details:
There are already several petitions on this issue
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=olympic+games
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=olympics
Please consider signing an existing petition, rather than creating your own.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
